Row.Text: +12 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route[NEWLINE]Extra one military and one economic policy slot[NEWLINE]Every round +8 [ICON_Envoy] point[NEWLINE]Get [ICON_GreatPerson] more 100%[NEWLINE]All unit +4 [ICON_Strength](Extra +8 for barbarian)[NEWLINE]All trade +4 [ICON_Gold][ICON_Production][ICON_Faith][ICON_Food][ICON_Culture][ICON_Science](If the target city is an ally, both players have an additional +2)[NEWLINE]All city +20% [ICON_Gold][ICON_Production][ICON_Faith][ICON_Food][ICON_Culture][ICON_Science](Extra +80% in the capital)
Have Germany, France, Rome's national culture.[NEWLINE]Can build Japan and France's special building.[NEWLINE]No special unit.
I am Saber, Charlemagne. In short, calm down first, how about listening to me?
